### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE quantum_research_projects (
 project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR,
 researcher_name VARCHAR,

)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE quantum_research_projects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_experiments (
    experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    experiment_description TEXT,
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES quantum_research_projects(project_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE quantum_research_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name' WHERE project_id = 1;

);
